document.title: WEL_TRACK_BAR
document.paragraph:
A WEL_TRACK_BAR control has a sliding pointer and optional tick marks.
2Appearance A WEL_TRACK_BAR created with `make_horizontal'.
images/wel_track_bar_horizontal.png wel_track_bar_horizontal
A WEL_TRACK_BAR created with `make_vertical'.
images/wel_track_bar_vertical.png wel_track_bar_vertical
